data.why:
A module (possible name:? Sample::Stick) for randomly sampling
    datasets according to a set of weights (probabililities).

    A module ((possible name? Tie::Array::Compact) for creating large,
    numeric-only Arrays using approx: 1/4 of the space of a standard
    Perl array.

meta.subject: PAUSE ID request (BROWSERUK; Nigel J Sandever)
